meta.description: Package glossary with descriptions for Stank Python Virtual Environment Manager

accelerate.name: Accelerate
accelerate.description: Hugging Face distributed training. Single code runs on CPU, single GPU, multi-GPU, TPU. Mixed precision, gradient accumulation, and DeepSpeed/FSDP integration. Minimal code changes.

aiofiles.name: aiofiles
aiofiles.description: Async file I/O. Read/write files without blocking. asyncio-native file operations.

aiohttp.name: aiohttp
aiohttp.description: Async HTTP client and server. High-performance web applications, WebSockets, streaming. Client sessions with connection pooling.

aiomultiprocess.name: aiomultiprocess
aiomultiprocess.description: Async multiprocessing. Combine asyncio with multiple processes. Parallel async tasks.

albumentations.name: Albumentations
albumentations.description: Image augmentation library. 70+ transforms for deep learning. Fast (OpenCV-based), flexible composition. Bounding box and keypoint support.

alive-progress.name: alive-progress
alive-progress.description: Animated progress bars. Spinners, throughput, ETA, and themes. Eye-catching progress indicators.

anthropic.name: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Official Claude AI SDK. Chat completions with Claude 3, streaming, function calling, vision (image understanding), and prompt caching. Async client available.

apache-log-parser.name: apache-log-parser
apache-log-parser.description: Parse Apache/Nginx logs. Extract IP, timestamp, request, status. Combined and common formats.

apscheduler.name: APScheduler
apscheduler.description: Advanced scheduler. Cron-like triggers, persistent job stores, multiple executors. Production-grade.

autograd.name: Autograd
autograd.description: Automatic differentiation. Compute gradients of NumPy code. Foundation for ML research.

av.name: PyAV
av.description: FFmpeg Python bindings. Low-level access to audio/video frames. Encoding, decoding, and transcoding.

azure-identity.name: Azure Identity
azure-identity.description: Azure authentication. Managed identity, service principal, and interactive login. DefaultAzureCredential.

azure-mgmt-resource.name: Azure Management
azure-mgmt-resource.description: Azure Resource Management. Create, update, and delete resources. Template deployments.

azure-storage-blob.name: Azure Blob Storage
azure-storage-blob.description: Azure Blob Storage client. Upload, download, and manage blobs. SAS tokens, tiers, and snapshots.

bcrypt.name: bcrypt
bcrypt.description: Password hashing with bcrypt. Automatic salt generation, configurable work factor. Resistant to GPU attacks. Standard for password storage.

beautifulsoup4.name: Beautiful Soup
beautifulsoup4.description: HTML/XML parsing for web scraping. Navigate, search, and modify parse trees. Works with html.parser, lxml, or html5lib. Handles malformed HTML gracefully.

boto3.name: Boto3
boto3.description: AWS SDK for Python. S3, EC2, Lambda, DynamoDB, and 200+ services. High-level Resource and low-level Client APIs.

botocore.name: Botocore
botocore.description: Low-level AWS interface. Request signing, endpoint resolution, and retries. boto3 foundation.

camelot-py.name: Camelot
camelot-py.description: PDF table extraction. Lattice (bordered) and stream (borderless) table detection. Returns pandas DataFrames.

cassandra-driver.name: Cassandra Driver
cassandra-driver.description: Apache Cassandra driver. CQL queries, prepared statements, connection pooling. Handles cluster topology and load balancing.

catboost.name: CatBoost
catboost.description: Gradient boosting by Yandex. Native categorical feature handling without encoding, ordered boosting to reduce overfitting, and fast GPU training. Excellent out-of-the-box performance.

cbor2.name: CBOR2
cbor2.description: CBOR codec. Concise Binary Object Representation. IoT and web-friendly binary format.

ccxt.name: CCXT
ccxt.description: Crypto exchange library. 100+ exchanges, unified API. Trade, fetch OHLCV, and manage orders.

chardet.name: chardet
chardet.description: Character encoding detection. Detect encoding of text files. Handle unknown encodings gracefully.

chevron.name: Chevron
chevron.description: Mustache templating. Logic-less templates, partials, and lambdas. Fast Python implementation.

chromadb.name: ChromaDB
chromadb.description: AI-native embedding database. Store and query vectors with metadata filtering. In-memory or persistent. Simple Python API. Perfect for RAG applications.

click.name: Click
click.description: CLI creation toolkit. Decorators for commands, options, arguments. Automatic help, input validation, and shell completion.

clickhouse-driver.name: ClickHouse Driver
clickhouse-driver.description: ClickHouse native driver. Columnar data insertion, query execution, and compression. Faster than HTTP interface.

cloudscraper.name: Cloudscraper
cloudscraper.description: Bypass anti-bot protection. Handles Cloudflare, DDoS-Guard, and similar challenges. Mimics browser TLS fingerprints. Drop-in requests replacement.

cohere.name: Cohere
cohere.description: Cohere AI API client. Generate, embed, classify, and rerank text. Enterprise-ready language models with semantic search capabilities.

colorama.name: Colorama
colorama.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text. ANSI escape sequences on Windows. Simple API for colored output.

concurrent-log-handler.name: concurrent-log-handler
concurrent-log-handler.description: Thread-safe log rotation. Multiple processes can write to the same log file safely.

contextily.name: contextily
contextily.description: Basemaps for plots. Add OpenStreetMap, Stamen, or other tiles to matplotlib/geopandas plots.

coverage.name: Coverage.py
coverage.description: Code coverage measurement. Line and branch coverage, HTML reports, and CI integration.

cryptography.name: Cryptography
cryptography.description: Cryptographic recipes and primitives. Fernet symmetric encryption, RSA/EC asymmetric, hashing, key derivation, X.509 certificates. High-level and low-level APIs.

cvxpy.name: CVXPY
cvxpy.description: Convex optimization. Model and solve convex problems. Multiple solver backends (ECOS, SCS, OSQP).

cython.name: Cython
cython.description: C-extensions for Python. Static typing for C-level speed. Compile Python to C.

dask.name: Dask
dask.description: Parallel computing for larger-than-memory data. Scales pandas DataFrames, NumPy arrays, and scikit-learn to clusters. Lazy evaluation with task graphs. Drop-in replacement for many pandas operations.

dataset.name: dataset
dataset.description: Simple database abstraction. Automatic table creation, upserts, and queries. SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL. Perfect for prototyping.

datasets.name: Datasets
datasets.description: Hugging Face datasets library. 1000+ NLP/CV datasets with streaming and memory-mapping. Arrow-backed for speed. Built-in train/test splits, shuffling, and preprocessing.

dicttoxml.name: dicttoxml
dicttoxml.description: Dict to XML conversion. Generate XML from Python data structures. Customizable output.

django.name: Django
django.description: Full-stack web framework. ORM, admin, auth, forms, and REST framework. Batteries included.

dnspython.name: dnspython
dnspython.description: Full-featured DNS toolkit. Queries, zone transfers, dynamic updates, DNSSEC validation. Build DNS clients and servers.

docx2pdf.name: docx2pdf
docx2pdf.description: Convert DOCX to PDF. Uses MS Word on Windows, LibreOffice elsewhere. Batch conversion support.

docxtpl.name: docxtpl
docxtpl.description: Word templates with Jinja2. Mail merge, loops, conditionals, and rich text formatting. Generate reports from templates.

dpkt.name: dpkt
dpkt.description: Fast packet parsing. Create and decode network packets. Supports Ethernet, IP, TCP, UDP, DNS, HTTP, and more. Lightweight alternative to scapy.

duckdb.name: DuckDB
duckdb.description: In-process OLAP database. SQL analytics on DataFrames and Parquet files. Zero dependencies, zero configuration. Excellent for data exploration.

easyocr.name: EasyOCR
easyocr.description: Ready-to-use OCR. Deep learning-based, 80+ languages, no training needed. GPU accelerated. Simple API.

einops.name: einops
einops.description: Elegant tensor operations. Einstein notation for rearrange, reduce, repeat. Framework-agnostic (NumPy, PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX). Makes complex reshaping operations readable.

elasticsearch.name: Elasticsearch
elasticsearch.description: Official Elasticsearch client. Full-text search, aggregations, and analytics. Index management, bulk operations, and async support.

email-validator.name: email-validator
email-validator.description: Email validation. Syntax, DNS, and deliverability checks. Normalize addresses.

emoji.name: emoji
emoji.description: Emoji support. Names, codes, and Unicode conversion. Emojize and demojize text.

extract-msg.name: extract-msg
extract-msg.description: Outlook .msg extraction. Get body, attachments, headers from MSG files.

extruct.name: extruct
extruct.description: Extract structured data from HTML. JSON-LD, Microdata, RDFa, OpenGraph, Twitter Cards. Schema.org vocabulary support.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.description: Remote execution via SSH. Deploy code, manage servers, run commands. Uses paramiko and invoke.

factory-boy.name: Factory Boy
factory-boy.description: Test fixtures made easy. Factory definitions for ORM models. Sequences, lazy attributes, and traits.

faiss-cpu.name: FAISS
faiss-cpu.description: Facebook's similarity search. Efficient nearest neighbor search for millions/billions of vectors. Multiple index types (IVF, HNSW, PQ). CPU-optimized version.

fake-useragent.name: fake-useragent
fake-useragent.description: Random user agent strings. Realistic browser user agents for rotation. Updated database of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge agents.

faker.name: Faker
faker.description: Fake data generation. Names, addresses, text, dates, and more. Localized for many countries.

fastapi.name: FastAPI
fastapi.description: Modern API framework. Automatic OpenAPI/Swagger docs, type validation with Pydantic, async support. One of the fastest Python frameworks.

fastavro.name: fastavro
fastavro.description: Fast Avro implementation. 10x faster than official library. Read/write Avro files efficiently.

feedparser.name: feedparser
feedparser.description: Universal feed parser. RSS 0.9x, 1.0, 2.0, Atom, and CDF support. Handles encoding, relative links, and malformed feeds. Date normalization.

ffmpeg-python.name: ffmpeg-python
ffmpeg-python.description: FFmpeg Python bindings. Video/audio conversion, editing, streaming. Build processing pipelines with fluent API.

fiona.name: Fiona
fiona.description: Geospatial vector I/O. Read/write shapefiles, GeoJSON, KML. GDAL/OGR wrapper.

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Auto-generate CLIs. Turn any Python object into a CLI. Functions, classes, modules, and objects.

flair.name: Flair
flair.description: State-of-the-art NLP. Stacked embeddings, named entity recognition, sequence labeling. Research-grade accuracy.

flanker.name: Flanker
flanker.description: Email parsing. Address validation and MIME message parsing. Mailgun open-source.

flask.name: Flask
flask.description: Micro web framework. Routing, templates, sessions, and extensions. Simple and flexible.

flatbuffers.name: FlatBuffers
flatbuffers.description: FlatBuffers serialization. Access data without parsing. Game development and mobile apps.

flax.name: Flax
flax.description: Neural network library for JAX. Functional design with explicit state handling. Modules, optimizers, and training utilities. Used by Google Brain and DeepMind for research.

folium.name: Folium
folium.description: Interactive maps. Leaflet.js maps in Python. Markers, popups, choropleths, and heatmaps.

fpdf2.name: FPDF2
fpdf2.description: Simple PDF generation. No dependencies, pure Python. Text, images, tables, and links. Lightweight alternative to ReportLab.

fredapi.name: FRED API
fredapi.description: FRED economic data. Access Federal Reserve data series. Requires free API key.

ftfy.name: ftfy
ftfy.description: Fix text encoding. Repair mojibake, normalize Unicode, and clean up encoding errors.

gekko.name: GEKKO
gekko.description: Dynamic optimization. Solve differential equations, model predictive control, and machine learning.

gensim.name: Gensim
gensim.description: Topic modeling and embeddings. Word2Vec, Doc2Vec, FastText, LDA, LSI. Memory-efficient streaming. Similarity queries.

geoip2.name: GeoIP2
geoip2.description: MaxMind GeoIP2 database reader. IP geolocation with city, country, ASN, and ISP data. Requires MaxMind database subscription.

geopandas.name: GeoPandas
geopandas.description: Pandas for geospatial data. Read shapefiles/GeoJSON, spatial joins, and geometry operations.

geopy.name: GeoPy
geopy.description: Geocoding library. Convert addresses to coordinates and reverse. Multiple geocoding services.

google-api-python-client.name: Google API Client
google-api-python-client.description: Google APIs client. Drive, Sheets, Gmail, Calendar, YouTube, and more. OAuth 2.0 authentication.

google-cloud-bigquery.name: Google BigQuery
google-cloud-bigquery.description: BigQuery client. Run SQL queries on petabytes. Load data, manage tables, and export results.

google-cloud-storage.name: Google Cloud Storage
google-cloud-storage.description: Google Cloud Storage client. Upload, download, and manage blobs. Signed URLs, resumable uploads.

goose3.name: Goose3
goose3.description: Article extraction library. Pull main content, top image, and metadata. Content formatting and image extraction. Used by Pinterest.

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.description: Microsoft's LLM control library. Templating with guaranteed structure, regex constraints, and interleaved generation. Works with many LLM providers.

hashid.name: hashid
hashid.description: Hash type identification. Detect MD5, SHA, bcrypt, and 200+ hash formats. Useful for CTFs and password cracking preparation.

httpretty.name: HTTPretty
httpretty.description: HTTP mocking at socket level. Mock any HTTP client library. Record and playback requests.

httpx.name: HTTPX
httpx.description: Modern HTTP client. Async support, HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2, connection pooling. requests-compatible API with additional features. Type-annotated.

huggingface-hub.name: Hugging Face Hub
huggingface-hub.description: Hugging Face Hub client. Download/upload models, datasets, and Spaces. Version control with Git LFS. Inference API and model cards.

hyperopt.name: Hyperopt
hyperopt.description: Hyperparameter optimization with Bayesian methods. Tree Parzen Estimators (TPE), random search, and adaptive algorithms. Integrates with scikit-learn, XGBoost, and deep learning frameworks.

hypothesis.name: Hypothesis
hypothesis.description: Property-based testing. Generate test cases automatically. Find edge cases you never imagined.

imageio.name: imageio
imageio.description: Image and video I/O. Read/write many formats including GIF, TIFF, and video. Simple interface, plugin architecture.

imapclient.name: IMAPClient
imapclient.description: IMAP email client. Read, search, and manage email. High-level interface to imaplib.

imbalanced-learn.name: imbalanced-learn
imbalanced-learn.description: Handle imbalanced classification datasets. Over-sampling (SMOTE, ADASYN), under-sampling, and combination methods. Compatible with scikit-learn pipelines. Essential for fraud detection, medical diagnosis.

impacket.name: Impacket
impacket.description: Network protocol implementations. SMB, MSRPC, NTLM, Kerberos, LDAP for Windows environments. Used in penetration testing tools like secretsdump, psexec.

influxdb-client.name: InfluxDB Client
influxdb-client.description: InfluxDB v2 client. Time series data writing and Flux queries. Batch writing, data point builders, and query result parsing.

instructor.name: Instructor
instructor.description: Structured LLM outputs. Pydantic model validation for GPT/Claude responses. Retry logic, streaming, and partial responses. Make LLMs return exactly what you need.

invoke.name: Invoke
invoke.description: Task execution tool. Pythonic make/rake replacement. Shell command helpers and task dependencies.

ipaddress.name: ipaddress
ipaddress.description: IP address manipulation (stdlib). IPv4/IPv6 networks, addresses, and interfaces. CIDR notation, subnetting, and containment checks.

ipykernel.name: IPython Kernel
ipykernel.description: IPython kernel. Execute Python in Jupyter notebooks. Enables code cells and magic commands.

ipywidgets.name: ipywidgets
ipywidgets.description: Interactive widgets. Sliders, dropdowns, buttons in notebooks. Build interactive dashboards.

jax.name: JAX
jax.description: Google's numerical computing library. Composable transformations: grad, jit, vmap, pmap. XLA compilation for GPU/TPU. NumPy-compatible API. Preferred for ML research and scientific computing.

jaxlib.name: jaxlib
jaxlib.description: XLA compilation backend for JAX. Provides JIT compilation to GPU/TPU. Required dependency for JAX. Contains CUDA/ROCm kernels and XLA optimizations.

jinja2.name: Jinja2
jinja2.description: Template engine. Inheritance, macros, and sandboxed execution. Used by Flask, Ansible, and many others.

joblib.name: joblib
joblib.description: Lightweight pipelining in Python. Transparent disk-caching of results, parallel processing helpers, and efficient serialization of NumPy arrays. Used internally by scikit-learn.

jupyterlab.name: JupyterLab
jupyterlab.description: Next-gen notebook IDE. Extensions, file browser, terminals, and multiple views. Modern Jupyter interface.

jupyterlab-widgets.name: JupyterLab Widgets
jupyterlab-widgets.description: JupyterLab widget support. Display ipywidgets in JupyterLab.

keras.name: Keras
keras.description: High-level neural networks API. Sequential and Functional APIs for building models. Focus on user experience and fast experimentation. Now integrated into TensorFlow as tf.keras.

keras-tuner.name: Keras Tuner
keras-tuner.description: Hyperparameter tuning for Keras. Random search, Hyperband, and Bayesian optimization. Define search spaces with hp objects. Integrates with TensorBoard for visualization.

langchain.name: LangChain
langchain.description: Framework for LLM applications. Chains, agents, memory, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Integrations with 50+ LLMs, vector stores, and tools. Build complex AI workflows.

langchain-community.name: LangChain Community
langchain-community.description: Community integrations for LangChain. Additional vector stores, LLM providers, document loaders, and tools. Extends core LangChain functionality.

langchain-openai.name: LangChain OpenAI
langchain-openai.description: OpenAI integration for LangChain. ChatOpenAI, OpenAIEmbeddings, and function calling support. Drop-in replacements with LangChain abstractions.

language-tool-python.name: language-tool-python
language-tool-python.description: Grammar and spell checker. LanguageTool integration for 25+ languages. Rule-based error detection.

librosa.name: librosa
librosa.description: Audio analysis toolkit. Load audio, extract features (MFCC, chroma), beat tracking, spectrograms. Music information retrieval.

lightgbm.name: LightGBM
lightgbm.description: Microsoft's gradient boosting framework. Histogram-based algorithms for speed, leaf-wise tree growth, and native categorical feature support. Lower memory usage than XGBoost. GPU and distributed training.

llama-index.name: LlamaIndex
llama-index.description: Data framework for LLM apps. Index documents, build knowledge graphs, and create retrieval pipelines. Query engines, chat engines, and agent frameworks.

loguru.name: Loguru
loguru.description: Logging made simple. One import, automatic formatting, rotation, and retention. Exception catching.

lxml.name: lxml
lxml.description: High-performance XML/HTML processing. XPath and XSLT support, C-backed speed, and memory efficiency. Parse huge documents. Foundation for many scraping tools.

mac-vendor-lookup.name: mac-vendor-lookup
mac-vendor-lookup.description: MAC address vendor lookup. Query IEEE OUI database for hardware manufacturer. Offline and online lookup options.

mailparser.name: mailparser
mailparser.description: Email message parsing. Parse emails from files or strings into structured data.

mako.name: Mako
mako.description: Fast template library. Python syntax in templates, caching, and Unicode support. Pylons/Pyramid default.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: Markdown to HTML converter. Reference implementation with extensions for tables, fenced code, and footnotes.

markdown2.name: markdown2
markdown2.description: Fast Markdown processor. Extras: tables, fenced-code, footnotes, cuddled-lists. Active development.

marshmallow.name: Marshmallow
marshmallow.description: Object serialization and validation. Convert complex objects to/from JSON. Schema definitions, field validation, nested objects.

matplotlib.name: Matplotlib
matplotlib.description: Comprehensive 2D/3D plotting library. Line plots, scatter, bar charts, histograms, heatmaps, subplots, and publication-quality figures. Highly customizable with LaTeX support. Backend for seaborn and pandas plotting.

maxminddb.name: maxminddb
maxminddb.description: MaxMind DB format reader. Read GeoIP2 and GeoLite2 databases. Pure Python and C extension versions.

mechanicalsoup.name: MechanicalSoup
mechanicalsoup.description: Stateful web browsing. Maintain sessions, fill forms, follow links. BeautifulSoup integration for parsing. Simulates browser without full rendering.

mlflow.name: MLflow
mlflow.description: MLOps lifecycle platform. Experiment tracking, model registry, and deployment. Compare runs, log artifacts, and serve models via REST API. Works with any ML library.

mlx.name: MLX
mlx.description: Apple's ML framework for Apple Silicon. Unified memory (no CPU/GPU copies), lazy evaluation, and NumPy-like API. Optimized for M1/M2/M3 chips. Fast local inference.

mlx-lm.name: MLX-LM
mlx-lm.description: Language models for MLX. Load and run LLMs (Llama, Mistral, Phi) on Apple Silicon. Quantization support, LoRA fine-tuning, and text generation utilities.

moviepy.name: MoviePy
moviepy.description: Video editing library. Cut, concatenate, add effects, titles, and audio. Export to various formats. Compositing support.

mplfinance.name: mplfinance
mplfinance.description: Financial charts. Candlestick, OHLC, renko, and point-and-figure charts. matplotlib-based.

mpmath.name: mpmath
mpmath.description: Arbitrary-precision math. 1000+ digit precision, special functions, and numerical methods.

msgpack.name: msgpack
msgpack.description: MessagePack serialization. Binary format, smaller than JSON, faster to parse. Cross-language compatibility.

nbconvert.name: nbconvert
nbconvert.description: Notebook conversion. Export to HTML, PDF, slides, Markdown, and more.

nbformat.name: nbformat
nbformat.description: Notebook format library. Read, write, and validate .ipynb files.

neo4j.name: Neo4j
neo4j.description: Neo4j graph database driver. Cypher queries, transactions, and result streaming. Build knowledge graphs and recommendation systems.

netaddr.name: netaddr
netaddr.description: Network address manipulation. IPv4, IPv6, and MAC address handling. CIDR calculations, IP ranges, and set operations.

netifaces.name: netifaces
netifaces.description: Network interface information. Get IP addresses, netmasks, MAC addresses, and gateways. Cross-platform interface enumeration.

networkx.name: NetworkX
networkx.description: Graph and network analysis library. Create, manipulate, and study complex networks. Algorithms for shortest paths, centrality, community detection. Visualization with matplotlib integration.

newspaper3k.name: newspaper3k
newspaper3k.description: Article extraction from news sites. Main content, authors, publish dates, images, and keywords. NLP-based extraction. Multi-language support.

nltk.name: NLTK
nltk.description: Natural Language Toolkit. Corpora, tokenizers, stemmers, taggers, parsers. Educational and research focus.

notebook.name: Jupyter Notebook
notebook.description: Classic Jupyter interface. Interactive computing with code, text, and visualizations.

nox.name: Nox
nox.description: Flexible test automation. Python-based configuration (not INI). Sessions for different test types.

numba.name: Numba
numba.description: JIT compiler for NumPy. LLVM-based, GPU support, parallel loops. Near-C performance.

numpy.name: NumPy
numpy.description: Fundamental package for numerical computing. Provides N-dimensional arrays, linear algebra, Fourier transforms, random number generation, and C/Fortran integration. Foundation for pandas, scikit-learn, and most scientific Python.

odfpy.name: odfpy
odfpy.description: OpenDocument format library. Read/write LibreOffice/OpenOffice ODS, ODT, ODP files.

oletools.name: oletools
oletools.description: Microsoft Office malware analysis. Extract VBA macros, detect suspicious patterns, analyze OLE files. Essential for malware triage.

onnx.name: ONNX
onnx.description: Open Neural Network Exchange format. Standardized model representation for interoperability. Convert between PyTorch, TensorFlow, and other frameworks. Edge deployment ready.

onnxruntime.name: ONNX Runtime
onnxruntime.description: High-performance ONNX inference. Hardware acceleration for CPU, GPU, and specialized accelerators. Quantization and graph optimizations. Production-ready serving.

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: Official OpenAI Python client. GPT-4/3.5 chat completions, DALL-E image generation, Whisper transcription, embeddings, and fine-tuning. Async support and streaming responses.

opencv-python.name: OpenCV
opencv-python.description: Computer vision library. Image/video processing, object detection, face recognition, optical flow. Industry standard for CV.

openpyxl.name: openpyxl
openpyxl.description: Excel 2010+ read/write. Formulas, charts, images, pivot tables, and conditional formatting. Most comprehensive Excel library.

opentelemetry-api.name: OpenTelemetry API
opentelemetry-api.description: OpenTelemetry API. Distributed tracing and metrics. Vendor-neutral observability.

opentelemetry-sdk.name: OpenTelemetry SDK
opentelemetry-sdk.description: OpenTelemetry SDK. Implement tracing and metrics. Export to various backends.

optax.name: Optax
optax.description: Gradient processing for JAX. Composable gradient transformations, optimizers (Adam, SGD, AdaGrad), and learning rate schedules. Combine transforms with optax.chain().

optuna.name: Optuna
optuna.description: Next-gen hyperparameter optimization. Efficient sampling (TPE, CMA-ES), pruning unpromising trials, and visualization dashboard. Define-by-run API. Supports distributed optimization.

orjson.name: orjson
orjson.description: Fast JSON library in Rust. 3-10x faster than standard json. Numpy/dataclass support. Memory efficient.

pandas.name: Pandas
pandas.description: Essential data analysis library. DataFrame and Series structures for loading CSV/Excel/SQL, cleaning messy data, groupby aggregations, time series, and merging datasets. The workhorse of data science workflows.

pandas-datareader.name: pandas-datareader
pandas-datareader.description: Remote data for pandas. FRED, World Bank, Yahoo, IEX, and more data sources.

paramiko.name: Paramiko
paramiko.description: SSH2 protocol library. Remote command execution, SFTP file transfers, and key management. Build SSH clients and servers. Fabric dependency.

parse.name: parse
parse.description: Reverse of format(). Parse strings using format-string patterns. Simple alternative to regex for structured text.

parsel.name: Parsel
parsel.description: Scrapy's selector library. XPath and CSS selectors for data extraction. Regex support, nested selectors. Works standalone outside Scrapy.

passlib.name: Passlib
passlib.description: Password hashing framework. 30+ schemes (bcrypt, argon2, pbkdf2, sha256_crypt). Hash verification, migration, and policy enforcement.

patool.name: patool
patool.description: Archive manager. 50+ formats via system tools. Uniform interface for all archive types.

pattern.name: Pattern
pattern.description: Web mining and NLP. Text processing, sentiment, web scraping, and machine learning. All-in-one toolkit.

pcapy-ng.name: pcapy-ng
pcapy-ng.description: Libpcap Python interface. Capture packets on network interfaces. BPF filter support. Used with dpkt or manual parsing.

pdf2image.name: pdf2image
pdf2image.description: Convert PDF to images. Uses poppler for rendering. Extract pages as PIL Images for OCR or processing.

pdfminer.six.name: pdfminer.six
pdfminer.six.description: PDF text extraction. Layout analysis, character-level positioning, and CJK language support. Focus on text extraction accuracy.

pdfplumber.name: pdfplumber
pdfplumber.description: PDF data extraction. Extract text with precise positioning, tables with cell detection, and metadata. Built on pdfminer.

pdfrw.name: pdfrw
pdfrw.description: PDF read/write library. Form filling, watermarking, and concatenation. Preserves original PDF structure.

peewee.name: Peewee
peewee.description: Simple, expressive ORM. Model definitions, queries, migrations, and connection pooling. Supports SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL.

pefile.name: pefile
pefile.description: PE file analysis. Parse Windows executables, DLLs, and drivers. Extract sections, imports, exports, resources. Malware analysis and reverse engineering.

peft.name: PEFT
peft.description: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning. LoRA, QLoRA, prefix tuning, and prompt tuning for large models. Fine-tune billion-parameter models on consumer GPUs.

pikepdf.name: pikepdf
pikepdf.description: PDF manipulation based on qpdf. Repair damaged PDFs, linearize for web, and handle encryption. Modern Pythonic API.

pillow.name: Pillow
pillow.description: Python Imaging Library. Open, manipulate, save images. Resize, crop, filter, draw. Supports 30+ formats. Foundation for image work.

pinecone-client.name: Pinecone
pinecone-client.description: Managed vector database client. Serverless similarity search at scale. Metadata filtering, namespaces, and hybrid search. Production-ready with high availability.

pingouin.name: Pingouin
pingouin.description: Statistical analysis made easy. ANOVAs, t-tests, correlations, effect sizes, power analysis, and Bayesian statistics. Pandas-friendly with beautiful output tables.

playwright.name: Playwright
playwright.description: Microsoft's browser automation. Chromium, Firefox, WebKit support. Auto-wait, network interception, and tracing. Faster and more reliable than Selenium. Async API.

plotly.name: Plotly
plotly.description: Interactive graphing library. Hover tooltips, zoom, pan, and web-ready charts. Supports 40+ chart types including 3D, maps, financial, and scientific. Export to HTML or use in Dash dashboards.

polars.name: Polars
polars.description: Lightning-fast DataFrame library in Rust. Lazy evaluation, query optimization, and parallel execution. 10-100x faster than pandas for many operations. Modern API with method chaining.

prettytable.name: PrettyTable
prettytable.description: ASCII table display. Alignment, sorting, and borders. Simple table creation from data.

prometheus-client.name: Prometheus Client
prometheus-client.description: Prometheus metrics. Counters, gauges, histograms, summaries. Expose /metrics endpoint.

prompt-toolkit.name: prompt-toolkit
prompt-toolkit.description: Build interactive CLIs. Full-screen apps, syntax highlighting, auto-completion. Powers IPython and pgcli.

protobuf.name: Protocol Buffers
protobuf.description: Protocol Buffers. Efficient binary serialization with schemas. Language-neutral, platform-neutral.

psycopg2-binary.name: psycopg2
psycopg2-binary.description: PostgreSQL adapter. Full DB-API 2.0 compliance, server-side cursors, COPY support, async connections. Most popular PostgreSQL driver.

pulp.name: PuLP
pulp.description: Linear programming. Model optimization problems, multiple solvers. Operations research.

py7zr.name: py7zr
py7zr.description: 7-Zip library. LZMA/LZMA2 compression, encryption, and multi-volume archives.

pyarrow.name: PyArrow
pyarrow.description: Apache Arrow implementation. Columnar memory format, zero-copy reads, and Parquet support. pandas integration.

pyaudio.name: PyAudio
pyaudio.description: PortAudio bindings. Record and play audio streams. Real-time audio processing. Cross-platform.

pyautogui.name: PyAutoGUI
pyautogui.description: GUI automation. Control mouse and keyboard, take screenshots, locate images on screen. Cross-platform.

pycryptodome.name: PyCryptodome
pycryptodome.description: Self-contained crypto library. AES, RSA, ECC, SHA, HMAC, and more. No external dependencies. PyCrypto drop-in replacement with active maintenance.

pydantic.name: Pydantic
pydantic.description: Data validation with type hints. Parse and validate JSON, environment variables, settings. Automatic JSON Schema generation. FastAPI core dependency.

pydub.name: pydub
pydub.description: Audio manipulation simplified. Slice, concatenate, export, apply effects. Works with many formats via ffmpeg.

pyexcel.name: pyexcel
pyexcel.description: Unified spreadsheet API. Single interface for xlsx, xls, ods, csv. Plugin architecture for format support.

pyexcel-ods.name: pyexcel-ods
pyexcel-ods.description: ODS format plugin for pyexcel. OpenDocument Spreadsheet read/write support.

pyexcel-xlsx.name: pyexcel-xlsx
pyexcel-xlsx.description: XLSX format plugin for pyexcel. Excel 2010+ read/write support.

pyfolio.name: pyfolio
pyfolio.description: Portfolio analytics. Tearsheet reports, risk metrics, and performance attribution. Zipline companion.

pymongo.name: PyMongo
pymongo.description: Official MongoDB driver. CRUD operations, aggregation pipeline, GridFS for files, change streams. Async version available (motor).

pymupdf.name: PyMuPDF
pymupdf.description: High-performance PDF library. Based on MuPDF. Text extraction, rendering, annotations, form filling. Handles damaged PDFs.

pymysql.name: PyMySQL
pymysql.description: Pure Python MySQL client. DB-API 2.0 compatible, SSL support, and prepared statements. No C dependencies for easy installation.

pynput.name: pynput
pynput.description: Input device control. Monitor and control mouse and keyboard. Global hotkeys and input recording.

pyomo.name: Pyomo
pyomo.description: Optimization modeling. Linear, nonlinear, and mixed-integer programming. Extensive solver support.

pyopenssl.name: pyOpenSSL
pyopenssl.description: OpenSSL wrapper for Python. SSL/TLS connections, certificate handling, and crypto operations. Lower-level than cryptography library.

pyparsing.name: pyparsing
pyparsing.description: Text parsing library. Create grammars without regex. Named results, recursive patterns, and parse actions.

pypdf.name: pypdf
pypdf.description: PDF manipulation toolkit. Merge, split, crop, rotate, encrypt/decrypt, and extract text. Pure Python, no dependencies.

pyproj.name: pyproj
pyproj.description: Coordinate transformations. PROJ library wrapper. CRS definitions and conversions.

pyshark.name: PyShark
pyshark.description: Wireshark/tshark wrapper. Packet capture and analysis with display filters. Access all Wireshark dissectors. Live capture and pcap file reading.

pystache.name: Pystache
pystache.description: Mustache template engine. Simple, logic-less templates. Cross-language template format.

pytesseract.name: pytesseract
pytesseract.description: Tesseract OCR wrapper. Extract text from images in 100+ languages. Requires Tesseract-OCR installation.

pytest.name: pytest
pytest.description: Testing framework. Fixtures, parametrization, plugins, and powerful assertions. Industry standard for Python testing.

pytest-asyncio.name: pytest-asyncio
pytest-asyncio.description: Async testing for pytest. Test asyncio code with async fixtures and markers.

pytest-cov.name: pytest-cov
pytest-cov.description: Coverage plugin for pytest. Terminal and HTML reports, branch coverage, and fail-under thresholds.

pytest-mock.name: pytest-mock
pytest-mock.description: Mock plugin for pytest. mocker fixture with patch, spy, and stub. Cleaner than unittest.mock.

pytextrank.name: pytextrank
pytextrank.description: TextRank for Python. Keyword and phrase extraction, sentence ranking. Knowledge graph integration.

python-barcode.name: python-barcode
python-barcode.description: Barcode generation. Code128, EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, ISBN-13. Output as images or SVG.

python-dateutil.name: python-dateutil
python-dateutil.description: Powerful date/time extensions. Flexible parsing of date strings, relative deltas (next Friday, last month), recurring rules (rrule), and timezone handling. Essential pandas dependency.

python-docx.name: python-docx
python-docx.description: Word document library. Create/modify paragraphs, tables, images, headers, footers, and styles. Does not require MS Office.

python-jose.name: python-jose
python-jose.description: JWT implementation. Create and verify JSON Web Tokens. JWS, JWE, and JWK support. Multiple signing algorithms.

python-json-logger.name: python-json-logger
python-json-logger.description: JSON log formatter. Add custom fields, integrate with log aggregators. ELK stack ready.

python-magic.name: python-magic
python-magic.description: File type detection via libmagic. Identify files by content, not extension. Same as Unix file command. MIME type detection.

python-multipart.name: python-multipart
python-multipart.description: Multipart form parser. Handle file uploads in ASGI/WSGI apps. Streaming parser for large files. FastAPI dependency.

python-nmap.name: python-nmap
python-nmap.description: Nmap scanner wrapper. Port scanning, service detection, and OS fingerprinting. Parse Nmap XML output. Automate network reconnaissance.

python-pptx.name: python-pptx
python-pptx.description: PowerPoint manipulation. Create/modify slides, shapes, charts, and tables. Add images, apply layouts, and format text.

python-whois.name: python-whois
python-whois.description: WHOIS domain lookup. Query registrar info, creation/expiry dates, nameservers. Supports many TLDs and registrars.

pythonjsonlogger.name: pythonjsonlogger
pythonjsonlogger.description: JSON formatter for logging. Alternative implementation with similar features.

pytorch-lightning.name: PyTorch Lightning
pytorch-lightning.description: High-level PyTorch wrapper. Removes boilerplate while keeping flexibility. Built-in logging, checkpointing, multi-GPU, and mixed precision. Organize code into LightningModules.

pyyaml.name: PyYAML
pyyaml.description: YAML parser and emitter. Full YAML 1.1 support, custom tags, and safe loading. Configuration files.

pyzbar.name: pyzbar
pyzbar.description: Barcode and QR code reader. Decode from images using zbar library. Returns decoded data and bounding boxes.

qrcode.name: qrcode
qrcode.description: QR code generator. Create QR codes as images or SVG. Customizable colors, error correction, and embedded logos.

quantlib.name: QuantLib
quantlib.description: Quantitative finance. Derivatives pricing, yield curves, and risk management. Comprehensive library.

questionary.name: questionary
questionary.description: Interactive prompts. Select, checkbox, confirm, text input with validation. Build interactive CLIs.

rake-nltk.name: rake-nltk
rake-nltk.description: Keyword extraction. Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction using word co-occurrence. Fast, unsupervised.

rarfile.name: rarfile
rarfile.description: RAR archive reader. Read RAR files. Extraction requires unrar command.

rasterio.name: Rasterio
rasterio.description: Geospatial raster I/O. Read/write GeoTIFF, satellite imagery. GDAL-based.

ray.name: Ray
ray.description: Distributed computing. Scale Python from laptop to cluster. Actors, tasks, and ML libraries.

redis.name: redis-py
redis.description: Redis Python client. Key-value operations, pub/sub, streams, Lua scripting, clustering. Connection pooling and pipelines for performance.

redmail.name: Red Mail
redmail.description: Advanced email library. Templates, scheduling, attachments, and HTML. Stateful email sending.

reportlab.name: ReportLab
reportlab.description: PDF generation toolkit. Create complex documents with text, graphics, charts, and tables. Used by Django and many others.

requests.name: Requests
requests.description: HTTP for humans. Simple API for GET/POST, sessions, authentication, file uploads, and timeouts. Connection pooling, automatic retries. Most popular HTTP library.

requests-html.name: requests-html
requests-html.description: HTML parsing with requests. CSS selectors, XPath, and JavaScript rendering via Chromium. Session handling and async support. Convenient for simple scraping.

responses.name: responses
responses.description: Mock HTTP requests. Decorate tests to mock requests library calls. Body, status, and headers.

rich.name: Rich
rich.description: Beautiful terminal output. Tables, syntax highlighting, progress bars, markdown, and panels. Make CLI apps gorgeous.

rst2pdf.name: rst2pdf
rst2pdf.description: reStructuredText to PDF. Page layouts, styles, code highlighting. Used for documentation.

scapy.name: Scapy
scapy.description: Packet manipulation powerhouse. Craft, send, sniff, and decode packets for 100+ protocols. Network scanning, traceroute, and attack tools. Essential for network security.

scikit-image.name: scikit-image
scikit-image.description: Image processing algorithms. Segmentation, geometric transforms, feature detection, morphology. NumPy-based, scikit-learn style API.

scikit-learn.name: scikit-learn
scikit-learn.description: Machine learning library with consistent API. Classification (SVM, Random Forest), regression, clustering (K-means), dimensionality reduction (PCA), model selection, and preprocessing. Industry standard for traditional ML.

scipy.name: SciPy
scipy.description: Scientific computing library built on NumPy. Modules for optimization, integration, interpolation, signal processing, linear algebra, statistics, and sparse matrices. Essential for engineering and research.

scrapy.name: Scrapy
scrapy.description: Web scraping framework. Spiders, selectors (CSS/XPath), pipelines, and middleware. Built-in handling for cookies, sessions, and robots.txt. Export to JSON/CSV/XML.

seaborn.name: Seaborn
seaborn.description: Statistical visualization built on matplotlib. Beautiful default themes, color palettes, and high-level functions for heatmaps, violin plots, pair plots, and regression visualizations. Makes complex plots simple.

selenium.name: Selenium
selenium.description: Browser automation with WebDriver. Control Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge. Handle JavaScript-rendered content, fill forms, and take screenshots. Testing and scraping.

sentence-transformers.name: Sentence Transformers
sentence-transformers.description: Sentence embeddings using transformers. Semantic search, clustering, and similarity. Pre-trained models for 100+ languages. Fine-tuning with triplet/contrastive loss.

sentry-sdk.name: Sentry SDK
sentry-sdk.description: Error tracking and monitoring. Automatic exception capture, performance monitoring, and release tracking.

shapely.name: Shapely
shapely.description: Geometric operations. Points, lines, polygons, intersections, buffers, and unions. GEOS wrapper.

shodan.name: Shodan
shodan.description: Shodan API client. Search Internet-connected devices, find vulnerabilities, monitor networks. Query cameras, servers, IoT devices worldwide.

soundfile.name: SoundFile
soundfile.description: Audio file I/O. Read/write WAV, FLAC, OGG via libsndfile. NumPy array interface.

spacy.name: spaCy
spacy.description: Industrial NLP library. Named entities, POS tagging, dependency parsing, word vectors. 70+ language models. Fast and accurate.

speech-recognition.name: SpeechRecognition
speech-recognition.description: Speech-to-text library. Support for Google, Sphinx, Wit.ai, Azure, and more. Microphone and file input.

sqlalchemy.name: SQLAlchemy
sqlalchemy.description: Python's SQL toolkit. ORM with Unit of Work pattern, Core for raw SQL, and migration support via Alembic. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Oracle, and more.

sqlite-utils.name: sqlite-utils
sqlite-utils.description: SQLite power tools. Create tables from data, full-text search, CSV import/export. CLI and Python library.

sslyze.name: SSLyze
sslyze.description: SSL/TLS scanner. Test server configurations, identify vulnerabilities (Heartbleed, ROBOT), and verify certificate chains. Security auditing.

starlette.name: Starlette
starlette.description: Lightweight ASGI framework. Routing, middleware, WebSocket, background tasks. Foundation for FastAPI. Production-ready performance.

statsd.name: statsd
statsd.description: StatsD metrics client. Send counters, timers, gauges to Graphite, DataDog, and others.

statsmodels.name: statsmodels
statsmodels.description: Statistical modeling and econometrics. Linear/logistic regression with detailed summaries, time series (ARIMA, VAR), hypothesis testing, and diagnostic plots. R-style formula interface available.

structlog.name: structlog
structlog.description: Structured logging. Context binding, processors, and formatters. JSON output for log aggregation.

sumy.name: Sumy
sumy.description: Automatic text summarization. LSA, TextRank, LexRank, KL-Sum algorithms. Extract key sentences.

sympy.name: SymPy
sympy.description: Symbolic mathematics. Algebra, calculus, equations, matrices, and plotting. Computer algebra system.

ta.name: TA
ta.description: Technical analysis. 40+ indicators: RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, moving averages. pandas integration.

tabula-py.name: tabula-py
tabula-py.description: PDF table extraction via tabula-java. Extract tables as DataFrames. Handles multi-page tables. Requires Java.

tabulate.name: tabulate
tabulate.description: Pretty-print tables. Plain, grid, pipe, HTML, LaTeX, and more formats. Alignment and formatting options.

tensorboard.name: TensorBoard
tensorboard.description: TensorFlow visualization toolkit. Track metrics, visualize model graphs, view embeddings in 3D, and compare experiments. Works with PyTorch via tensorboardX or native support.

tensorflow.name: TensorFlow
tensorflow.description: Google's end-to-end ML platform. Keras high-level API, eager and graph execution, TensorBoard visualization, TF Serving deployment. Mobile (TFLite) and web (TF.js) support.

tensorflow-metal.name: TensorFlow Metal
tensorflow-metal.description: TensorFlow GPU plugin for Mac. Accelerate training and inference on Apple Silicon using Metal Performance Shaders. Drop-in acceleration for existing TF code.

textblob.name: TextBlob
textblob.description: Simple NLP. Sentiment analysis, POS tagging, noun phrases, translation. Built on NLTK. Great for beginners.

tiktoken.name: tiktoken
tiktoken.description: OpenAI's fast BPE tokenizer. Count tokens before API calls, split text for context windows. Rust backend for speed. Supports GPT-4, GPT-3.5, and embedding models.

timm.name: timm
timm.description: PyTorch Image Models. 700+ pre-trained models (EfficientNet, ViT, ConvNeXt, Swin). Training scripts, augmentation, and model surgery utilities. State-of-the-art accuracy.

tlslite-ng.name: tlslite-ng
tlslite-ng.description: Pure Python TLS implementation. Custom protocol development, testing, and research. Supports TLS 1.0-1.3, various cipher suites.

toml.name: toml
toml.description: TOML configuration parser. TOML 0.5.0 specification. pyproject.toml and other config files.

tomli.name: tomli
tomli.description: TOML parser (read-only). PEP 680 compliant. Now in Python 3.11+ stdlib as tomllib.

torch.name: PyTorch
torch.description: Meta's deep learning framework. Dynamic computation graphs, automatic differentiation, GPU acceleration via CUDA/MPS, and extensive ecosystem (torchvision, torchaudio). Preferred for research and production.

torchaudio.name: torchaudio
torchaudio.description: Audio processing for PyTorch. I/O for multiple formats, transforms (spectrogram, MFCC), and pre-trained models for speech recognition and audio classification. GPU-accelerated processing.

torchmetrics.name: TorchMetrics
torchmetrics.description: 100+ PyTorch metrics with distributed support. Classification (accuracy, F1, AUROC), regression, NLP (BLEU, perplexity), and retrieval metrics. Automatic accumulation across batches.

torchvision.name: torchvision
torchvision.description: Computer vision for PyTorch. Pre-trained models (ResNet, EfficientNet, ViT), image transforms and augmentations, and standard datasets (ImageNet, COCO, MNIST). Video and detection utilities.

tortoise-orm.name: Tortoise ORM
tortoise-orm.description: Async ORM inspired by Django. Works with asyncio and FastAPI. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite. Schema generation.

tox.name: Tox
tox.description: Test across Python versions. Virtual environment management, parallel execution, and CI integration.

tqdm.name: tqdm
tqdm.description: Progress bar library. Wrap any iterable, pandas integration, nested bars. Overhead of nanoseconds per iteration.

trafilatura.name: Trafilatura
trafilatura.description: Web text extraction. Optimized for news articles and web content. Metadata extraction, language detection. Faster and more accurate than newspaper3k.

transformers.name: Transformers
transformers.description: Hugging Face's NLP/ML library. 100,000+ pre-trained models for text, vision, and audio. Tokenizers, pipelines, and Trainer API. State-of-the-art with simple interfaces.

typer.name: Typer
typer.description: Build CLIs with type hints. Automatic completion, documentation, and validation. Click-based with modern features.

ujson.name: UltraJSON
ujson.description: Ultra fast JSON. C-based encoder/decoder. Drop-in json replacement with better performance.

unidecode.name: Unidecode
unidecode.description: Unicode to ASCII. Transliterate international text. é→e, 北京→Bei Jing.

user-agents.name: user-agents
user-agents.description: Parse user agent strings. Extract browser name/version, OS, device type. Detect bots and crawlers. Useful for analytics.

uvicorn.name: Uvicorn
uvicorn.description: Lightning-fast ASGI server. HTTP/1.1, WebSocket, HTTP/2 support. Works with Starlette, FastAPI, and other ASGI apps.

uvloop.name: uvloop
uvloop.description: Fast asyncio event loop. Cython wrapper for libuv. 2-4x faster than default loop.

wandb.name: Weights & Biases
wandb.description: Weights & Biases experiment tracking. Real-time metrics, hyperparameter sweeps, model versioning, and team collaboration. Beautiful dashboards and artifact management.

watchdog.name: Watchdog
watchdog.description: Filesystem monitoring. Watch directories for changes. File system events and observer pattern.

weasyprint.name: WeasyPrint
weasyprint.description: HTML/CSS to PDF. Print CSS support, page layouts, headers/footers. Generate PDFs from web templates.

weaviate-client.name: Weaviate
weaviate-client.description: Vector search engine client. Hybrid BM25 + vector search, GraphQL API, and generative search (RAG). Multi-modal support for text and images.

websockets.name: websockets
websockets.description: WebSocket client and server. Async implementation, connection management, and protocol handling. Build real-time applications.

whisper.name: Whisper
whisper.description: OpenAI's speech recognition. Multilingual transcription and translation. Multiple model sizes. State-of-the-art accuracy.

wordcloud.name: wordcloud
wordcloud.description: Word cloud generator. Create images from text with customizable shapes, colors, and fonts.

xgboost.name: XGBoost
xgboost.description: Extreme Gradient Boosting. Regularized boosting with tree pruning, handling missing values, and parallel processing. Won many Kaggle competitions. Supports GPU training and distributed computing.

xhtml2pdf.name: xhtml2pdf
xhtml2pdf.description: HTML to PDF converter. ReportLab-based rendering. CSS support and page templates.

xlrd.name: xlrd
xlrd.description: Read Excel .xls files. Legacy Excel 97-2003 format support. Read-only. Use openpyxl for .xlsx.

xlsxwriter.name: XlsxWriter
xlsxwriter.description: Excel file creation. Write-only with full formatting, charts, images, sparklines. Memory-optimized for large files.

xlwt.name: xlwt
xlwt.description: Write Excel .xls files. Legacy Excel 97-2003 format. Formatting, formulas, and merged cells.

xmltodict.name: xmltodict
xmltodict.description: XML to dict conversion. Parse XML as Python dictionaries. Makes XML feel like JSON.

yagmail.name: yagmail
yagmail.description: Easy email sending. Gmail/SMTP with attachments and HTML. OAuth2 and app passwords.

yara-python.name: yara-python
yara-python.description: YARA pattern matching. Create rules to identify malware families, detect indicators of compromise. Used by security researchers and AV vendors.

yfinance.name: yfinance
yfinance.description: Yahoo Finance data. Historical prices, dividends, splits, and financials. Free market data.

yt-dlp.name: yt-dlp
yt-dlp.description: Video downloader. YouTube and 1000+ sites. Format selection, playlists, subtitles, metadata extraction. youtube-dl fork.

zipfile38.name: zipfile38
zipfile38.description: Enhanced zipfile. Backport of Python 3.8+ improvements. Path-like objects and more.

zipline-reloaded.name: Zipline Reloaded
zipline-reloaded.description: Backtesting framework. Event-driven trading simulation. Quantopian open-source.

apache-avro.name: Apache Avro
apache-avro.description: Avro serialization. Schema evolution, RPC, and compact binary encoding. Big data ecosystem standard.

lz4.name: LZ4
lz4.description: LZ4 compression. Extremely fast compression and decompression. Block and frame formats.
